name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit Save File
summary: Learn about .NFS11SAVE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NFS11SAVE files are created within the [user]\​My Documents\​Criterion Games\​Need for Speed(TM) Hot Pursuit\​ directory. They use the filenames config.NFS11Save and controls.NFS11Save.
NOTE: Electronic Arts discontinued Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit.

description: Game file created by Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit, a racing game; saves control configurations (keyboard, gamepads, steering wheels) and personal settings configured inside the game; enables settings to be saved.
